results.title: A 37-Year-Old Man With Pleuritic Chest Pain.
results.text_hl: He denied @DISEASE_Fever @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@, but endorsed @DISEASE_Chills @DISEASE_MESH:D023341 @@@chills@@@ and night @<m>DISEASE_Sweat_Gland_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013543 @@@sweats@@@. His medications included @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, and @CHEMICAL_saxagliptin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C502994 @@@saxagliptin@@@.

citations.NLM: Galant-Swafford J, Light M, Onaitis MW, Rawlings SA, Fierer J, Landsberg JW. A 37-Year-Old Man With Pleuritic Chest Pain. Chest. 2019 Jul;156(1):e15-e21. PMID: 31279380
